mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Higginbotham, John
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Middleport, Miegs Co., Ohio [Middleport, Meigs County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Higginbotham, John Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Fracture left foot metatarsal bone of the great toe and contusion of left hip. Location Wounded: Short Creek, WV. Date Wounded: 1862/08/15. Nature of Wound: Wagon wheel. Result: Returned to duty.
